CustomField.description: Additional descriptor for the environment (e.g., "1", "2", "A", "B", "Primary", "Secondary"). Used to differentiate between multiple environments of the same type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a text value to differentiate between multiple environments of the same type (e.g., Dev1, Dev2, Staging-A, Production-Primary).
CustomField.label: Environment Descriptor
